flounder.physics

Class AABB

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.physics.AABB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IShape<AABB>

    public class AABB
extends java.lang.Object
implements IShape<AABB>
    A 3D axis-aligned bounding box.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AABB()
      Creates a new blank 3D AABB.

      Creates a new AABB from another AABB source.

      Creates a new AABB based on it's extents.

        destination - The destination AABB or null if a new AABB is to be created.

        A new AABB, scaled by the specified amounts.

        rotation - The amount to rotate.
        scale - The amount to scale the object.
        destination - The destination AABB or null if a new AABB is to be created.
        Returns:
        An AABB equivalent to this, but in a new position.
